title: proxyd sometimes not working

body: Please reopen this if its still an issue

Seeing this on Base Goerli today

```
Status: 503
URL: https://goerli.base.org
Request body: {"method":"eth_getLogs","params":[{"address":"0x57480303768F533AaADa9207Ec2E4064BaEE0Fe6","topics":["0x7d917fcbc9a29a9705ff9936ffa599500e4fd902e4486bae317414fe967b307c"],"fromBlock":"0x0","toBlock":"latest"}]}
Details: {"code":-32011,"message":"no backends available for method"}
```

Same **no backends available for method** error. Maybe Base is using proxyd internally?

> Seeing this on Base Goerli today
> 
> ```
> Status: 503
> URL: https://goerli.base.org
> Request body: {"method":"eth_getLogs","params":[{"address":"0x57480303768F533AaADa9207Ec2E4064BaEE0Fe6","topics":["0x7d917fcbc9a29a9705ff9936ffa599500e4fd902e4486bae317414fe967b307c"],"fromBlock":"0x0","toBlock":"latest"}]}
> Details: {"code":-32011,"message":"no backends available for method"}
> ```
> 
> Same **no backends available for method** error. Maybe Base is using proxyd internally?

reasonable,proxyd is suitable for load balancing
https://blog.oplabs.co/reliability-and-hardening/
